item.title: HP Stream notebooks include a complimentary one-year subscription to Office 365 and OneDrive
item.description: HP has introduced two new notebook PCs to its HP Stream line of lightweight, cloud-based Windows devices. HP emphasizes affordability, offering these thin and light notebooks at a lower price point than typically seen. Source: HP. The HP Stream notebooks come in horizon blue and orchid magenta. “Consumers today want mobile devices that reflect their style and empower them to work and play from anywhere,” says Serena Yong, General Manager for Printing & Personal Systems at HP Singapore and Malaysia.
